[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1602461877484{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column el_class=”normPadColTBMobile”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1602457240458{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 2% !important;}”]

Why choose us?

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Based in the Bayside suburb of Brighton in Melbourne, our passion is to provide all types of small businesses with world-class web design and development services.

Our clients choose us because they trust our process, our experience, and our passion.

We become an extension of your business by not only, crafting a beautiful website that sells your brand, services, and products, but also offering long-term web development support and assistance, whenever you need it.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1603171307924{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” simple_background_color=”#f4f4f4″][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603149244083{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner el_class=”forceBgRight” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1603171792240{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/bg-time.jpg?id=14467) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”normPadColMobile” width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1604357485326{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;padding-left: 120px !important;}”][vc_raw_html css=”.vc_custom_1603171691041{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1602461037578{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603230206636{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner el_class=”normPadMobile padT60mobile” width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1604358530394{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Read more from some of our own clients

There are plenty more reasons to choose to work with us – find out what our past client have to say about their own Confetti Design experience![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1604612978538{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”]

  • Adelle Jones ★★★★★
     Professionalism, Quality
  • Halarakis Kylie ★★★★★
    We have loved working with Johannah and her team. She took the time to understand our business and what we required with our website. Johannah provided clear guidance of copy, images and set up that suited our needs. We are very proud of … More the final product and look forward to working with Confetti Design in the future.
  • Michelle Papageorge ★★★★★
    Johannah did an amazing job at really understanding our business and what we wanted to achieve. Our website is one we are proud for our clients and prospective clients to view and which demonstrates what sets us aside from others. We highly … More recommend Johannah and Confetti Design as they helped take our business to the next level with an individual and professional website.
  • Stuart Styles ★★★★★
    Great communicator and a real flair for design. We loved the process and it was a delight to work with Johannah! 5 stars *****
  • John Tregaskis ★★★★★
    Wonderful Johannah has sorted our Facebook page and website. She is flexible and accommodating with our requirements and everything is managed professionally and it allows us more time to concerntrate on our clients. Thank you Johannah … More and Confetti.
  • Richard Kemp ★★★★★
    We refer all our clients to Johannah from Confetti Design because the feedback is always positive. You know someone is doing a great job when the people you send to them call you just to say how happy they are with the service they received. … More If you need to attract new customers, sell product online or just provide information to your existing client base then Confetti Design is the place to be.
  • Anish Rebello ★★★★★
    When the overwhelming shock of me quitting my job and deciding to go out and start my own law firm wore off, the first thing I knew that had to be done was to get a website.For weeks I had heard Johannah’s brilliant idea of a 1 page website, … More in 1 day for 1 price and wondered who I knew I could refer her too…little did I know that person would be me and Umbrella Family Law.Her questionnaire that she provided to help us understand the website was pointed and specific which allowed me and my Partners to give as much information as possible – and what was even more incrediblewas her way to understand exactly what we were saying through words and translate on to the website.But the cherry on top of our umbrella sundae was the logo – the colour, the design received nothing but rave reviews from all those I spoke too, both family and friends and even some in this chapter.Having a website is one thing. However having a website, and more specifically, having someone who can translate your idea, your vision and your purpose with such ease and so effortlessly is something youcannot put a price on – although with Johannah’s fixed price – you can, and it is so worth it.For anyone looking to revamp their website or wanting to tear it down and start new – I cannot stress enough that you must see Johannah
  • Neville Samuels ★★★★★
    Working with Johannah has been a pleasure. From the start of her process, she has been amazing to work with - no problem is too big and everything she does is professional to the highest degree.Designing our website was not easy because … More I lack design flair and vision, and that is exactly what Johannah and her team have brought to our latest website.On top of that, she has great resources around her, so when she needs to bring in other professionals, be it copywriting or photography, I knew I was in good hands.Johannah Barton and her team are consummate professionals, and are highly recommended.
  • Mark Round ★★★★★
    Working with Johannah and the Confetti Design team has been been a professional process from start to finish. Her ideas and designs have been first class, they have never missed a deadline and have always been flexible and responsive to … More any required changes. I strongly recommend Johannah and Confetti Design
  • Paul Mawdsley ★★★★★
    From day one Johannah had a clear vision for the two sites we were updating . She had a great understanding of our brand, what it is we are looking to achieve and the best way to go about this . As well as an amazing eye for detail and … More design Confetti pick up on the little things that separate average websites from great websites . Johannah and her team were always very responsive and nothing was to much effort. Before going live it is normal to have small errors and imperfections. In the past it has always been up to us to point these out but Johannah picked up on things that previous developers wouldn’t or would just leave for us to find. I would have no hesitation in referring Confetti to other business's in fast already have and will be back again when it is time to update and renew.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Our Reviews on Google

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”forceBgLeft” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1603230707941{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/bg-greview.jpg?id=14485) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
